object_name.value: Validate document is not associated with an inactive clinical trial.

title.value: Used to prevent documents from being made 'Effective' while the relevant Clinical Trial Registration Form is in a 'frozen' state (i.e. "Halted' or 'Completed').B40

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution

This document cannot be created or made ''Effective/Approved/Final'' at this time, because it relates to a clinical trial ($value(clinical_trial_id)) that's currently not Active. If necessary, you should contact the relevant Clinical Trial Manager(s) to request that the trial is re-activated, so you can create or make this document ''Effective/Approved/Final''.
cd_clinical_trial_info where clinical_trial_id= '$value(clinical_trial_id)' and a_status not in ('Active','Completed') and is_template = false
